snippet: The Newtown-Sandy Hook Community Foundation said the money would be given to the families of the children and educators killed in the Dec. 14 shooting, among others.
abstract: Newtown-Sandy Hook Community Foundation, facing complaints about timely distribution of money raised after killings at Sandy Hook School in Newtown, Conn, says it will distribute $4 million to 40 families directly affected by massacre in the coming weeks.
lead_paragraph: The Newtown-Sandy Hook Community Foundation said the money would be given to the families of the children and educators killed in the Dec. 14 shooting, among others.

headline.seo: Foundation to Distribute $4 Million to Families Affected by Newtown Massacre
headline.main: Foundation Releasing Aid to Families in Newtown
headline.print_headline: Foundation Releasing Aid To Families In Newtown
